data.title: David Mordaunt v. Bausch & Lomb, Inc.,
authors: US District Court for the Central District of California
data.meta_description: Labor: Other case filed on January 8, 2014  in the California Central District Court
data.text: November 6, 2014 Filing 75 ORDER DISMISSING ENTIRE ACTION WITH PREJUDICE by Judge Fernando M. Olguin, re Stipulation to Dismiss #74 . (vdr) November 5, 2014 Filing 74 STIPULATION to Dismiss Case filed by Defendant Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Attachments: #1 Proposed Order)(Welsh, Robert) October 9, 2014 Filing 73 ORDER DISMISSING ACTION by Judge Fernando M. Olguin. (Case Terminated; Made JS-6) (vdr) October 9, 2014 Filing 72 NOTICE of Settlement Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Welsh, Robert) October 1, 2014 Filing 71 ORDER GRANTING STIPULATION #69 TO CONTINUE by Judge Fernando M. Olguin. B+L's Response to Plaintiff's Motion to Extend Expert Discovery Deadlines will be extended until 10/10/2014; and Plaintiff's Reply to the Motion will be extended until 10/17/2014. (vdr) September 30, 2014 Filing 70 STIPULATION to Continue Interrogatory Deadlines to Allow Parties to Finalize Settlement filed by defendant Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Attachments: #1 Proposed Order)(Hicks, Diamond) September 30, 2014 Filing 69 STIPULATION to Continue Case Deadlines to Allow Parties to Finalize Settlement filed by defendant Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Attachments: #1 Proposed Order)(Hicks, Diamond) September 26, 2014 Filing 68 MINUTES OF Telephone Conference held before Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. If Defendant believes that a motion to compel further responses is necessary, it will file that motion by noon on Wednesday, October 22. (See Minutes for further details) denying #62 Motion for Hearing Court Recorder: CS 9/26/2014. (vm) September 25, 2014 Filing 67 NOTICE OF MOTION AND MOTION to Extend Discovery Cut-Off Date to 12/19/2014 filed by Plaintiff David Mordaunt. Motion set for hearing on 10/23/2014 at 10:00 AM before Judge Fernando M. Olguin. (Attachments: #1 Declaration of Roy Z. Silva, #2 Proposed Order)(Silva, Roy) September 23, 2014 Filing 66 SCHEDULING NOTICE by Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. Telephone Conference set for September 26, 2014 at 11:00 AM. Defense counsel will provide call-in instructions to the parties. THERE IS NO PDF DOCUMENT ASSOCIATED WITH THIS ENTRY. (vm) TEXT ONLY ENTRY September 22, 2014 Filing 65 MINUTES OF Settlement Conference held before Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. The Court conducted a settlement conference with the parties today. Case did not settle.Court Recorder: CS 9/22/2014. (vm) September 22, 2014 Filing 64 DECLARATION of Roy Z. Silva in support of MOTION for Hearing to Enlarge Time Allotted to Complete Plaintiff's Deposition #62 filed by Respondent Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Welsh, Robert) September 22, 2014 Filing 63 DECLARATION of Robert C. Welsh in support of MOTION for Hearing to Enlarge Time Allotted to Complete Plaintiff's Deposition #62 filed by Respondent Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Attachments: #1 Exhibit A, B, and C)(Welsh, Robert) September 22, 2014 Filing 62 NOTICE OF MOTION AND MOTION for Hearing to Enlarge Time Allotted to Complete Plaintiff's Deposition filed by Defendant Bausch & Lomb Inc. Motion set for hearing on 10/15/2014 at 09:30 AM before Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. (Attachments: #1 Memorandum /Joint Stipulation, #2 Proposed Order)(Welsh, Robert) August 13, 2014 Filing 61 ORDER GRANTING JOINT REQUEST #59 by Judge Fernando M. Olguin. The fact discovery cut-off date is extended to 10/31/2014. (vdr) August 11, 2014 Filing 60 NOTICE TO FILER OF DEFICIENCIES in Electronically Filed Documents RE: Stipulation to Extend Discovery Cut-Off Date #59 . The following error(s) was found: Joint Stipulation and Proposed Order should be submitted to District Judge Olguin.. In response to this notice the court may order (1) an amended or correct document to be filed (2) the document stricken or (3) take other action as the court deems appropriate. You need not take any action in response to this notice unless and until the court directs you to do so. (vm) August 8, 2014 Filing 59 Joint STIPULATION to Extend Discovery Cut-Off Date filed by Defendant Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Attachments: #1 Proposed Order Granting Joint Request to Continue Fact Discovery Cut-Off Date)(Welsh, Robert) July 21, 2014 Filing 58 NOTICE of Appearance filed by attorney Dawn Kennedy on behalf of Respondent Bausch & Lomb Inc (Attorney Dawn Kennedy added to party Bausch & Lomb Inc(pty:res))(Kennedy, Dawn) July 21, 2014 Filing 57 SCHEDULING NOTICE RE: SETTLEMENT CONFERENCE by Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. The previously scheduled settlement conference set for July 1, 2014 has been rescheduled to September 22, 2014 at 2:00 p.m. The parties are ordered to appear at that date and time. #53 THERE IS NO PDF DOCUMENT ASSOCIATED WITH THIS ENTRY. (vm) TEXT ONLY ENTRY May 19, 2014 Filing 56 NOTICE of Appearance filed by attorney Robert C Welsh on behalf of Respondent Bausch & Lomb Inc (Attorney Robert C Welsh added to party Bausch & Lomb Inc(pty:res))(Welsh, Robert) May 5, 2014 Filing 55 ORDER RE: PROTECTIVE ORDER by Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. (See Order for further details) re Stipulation for Protective Order #54 (vm) May 1, 2014 Filing 54 STIPULATION for Protective Order filed by Defendant Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Attachments: #1 Proposed Order)(Hicks, Diamond) March 26, 2014 Filing 53 MINUTE (IN CHAMBERS) ORDER RE: SETTLEMENT CONFERENCE by Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. The Court will conduct a settlement conference in this action on July 1, 2014, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. The parties will appear before the Hon. Michael R. Wilner, Courtroom H, 9th Floor, United States Courthouse, 312 N. Spring St., Los Angeles, California. (See Minute Order for further details) (vm) March 12, 2014 Filing 52 ORDER RE: TELEPHONE CONFERENCE by Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. The Court confers with counsel regarding the status of the case. Parties are encouraged to meet and confer regarding a potential resolution of the case. If the case is not resolved, a settlement conference is tentatively set for July 1, 2014 at 2:00 p.m. Counsel will notify the clerk if an alternative date needs to be set. THERE IS NO PDF DOCUMENT ASSOCIATED WITH THIS ENTRY. (vm) TEXT ONLY ENTRY March 7, 2014 Filing 51 SCHEDULING NOTICE by Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner. Telephone Conference set for 3/12/2014 at 10:00 AM. The clerk will provide the parties' with call-in information. THERE IS NO PDF DOCUMENT ASSOCIATED WITH THIS ENTRY. (vm) TEXT ONLY ENTRY March 4, 2014 Filing 50 ORDER/REFERRAL to ADR Procedure No 1 by Judge Fernando M. Olguin. Case ordered to Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner for Settlement Conference. ADR Proceeding to be held no later than 8/14/2014. (jp) February 28, 2014 Filing 49 REQUEST for ADR Procedure No. 1 filed. Parties request to Appear Before Magistrate Judge for settlement proceedings. Filed by Respondent Bausch & Lomb Inc.(Rosenthal, Margaret) February 14, 2014 Filing 48 ORDER RE SUMMARY JUDGMENT MOTIONS by Judge Fernando M. Olguin. (vdr) February 14, 2014 Filing 47 SCHEDULING AND CASE MANAGEMENT ORDER RE: JURY TRIAL by Judge Fernando M. Olguin. The court deems a Scheduling Conference unnecessary and hereby vacates the hearing. A Jury Trial is set for 3/3/2015 at 8:30 AM; Final Pretrial Conference and Motions in Limine hearing set for 2/13/2015 at 10:00 AM before Judge Fernando M. Olguin. *See order for deadlines and requirements.* (vdr) February 6, 2014 Filing 46 JOINT RULE 26(f) REPORT filed by Petitioner David Mordaunt. Olguin. Scheduling Conference set for 2/20/2014 at 10:00 AM before Judge Fernando M. Olguin; Rule 26 Meeting Report due by 2/6/2014. (vdr) January 16, 2014 Filing 41 TEXT ONLY ENTRY by Chambers of Judge Fernando M. Olguin. This matter has been assigned to District Judge Fernando M. Olguin. All pleadings filed in this matter should contain the case number and the assigned judges' initials to ensure proper routing of documents. The Court refers counsel to the Court's Initial Standing Order found on the Court's Website under Judge Olguin's Procedures and Schedules. Please read this Order carefully.THERE IS NO PDF DOCUMENT ASSOCIATED WITH THIS ENTRY. (vdr) TEXT ONLY ENTRY January 15, 2014 Filing 40 NOTICE of Change of Attorney Business or Contact Information: for attorney Margaret Rosenthal counsel for Respondent Bausch & Lomb Inc. (Rosenthal, Margaret) January 15, 2014 Filing 39 NOTICE of Change of Attorney Business or Contact Information: for attorney Diamond M Hicks counsel for Respondent Bausch & Lomb Inc. Changing Address to 11601 Wilshire Boulevard, Suite 1400, Los Angeles, CA 90025. Filed by Defendant Bausch & Lomb Incorporated. (Hicks, Diamond) January 10, 2014 Filing 38 ORDER RETURNING CASE FOR REASSIGNMENT UPON RECUSAL by Magistrate Judge Ralph Zarefsky. ORDER case returned to the Clerk for random reassignment Discovery pursuant to General Order 05-07 and General Order 08-05. Case randomly reassigned from Magistrate Judge Ralph Zarefsky to Magistrate Judge Michael R. Wilner for all further proceedings. The case number will now reflect the initials of the transferee Judge CV 14-00155 FMO(MRWx).
